Headline: Yello Line Service Temporarily Suspended
ShortDescription: Service on the Yellow Line has been temporarily suspended due to debris on the tracks.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Service on the Yellow Line has been temporarily suspended due to debris on the tracks. 

Shuttle buses have been requested to provide connecting service through the affected area.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines. This may include: #97 Skokie.

We are working to restore service as soon as possible. We apologize for the inconvenience and appreciate your understanding.

Allow extra travel time.
